text: Sir Edmund Wickham Lawrence (born 14 February 1932) is an economist. He was the Governor-General of St. Kitts and Nevis from 2013 to 2015. In the 1999 New Year Honours, Sir Edmund was honored as an Officer of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire (OBE). ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Governors-General of Saint Kitts and Nevis Category:Living people Category:Business people Category:Economists
title: Edmund Wickham Lawrence
